content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to browse https://www.alltrails.com/ for notable features of a hiking trail, but received a server error. The error message suggested to retry or contact the help center at help.openai.com. I checked my internet connection by pinging google.com and running a Python code to check if the internet connection is working. The result showed that my internet connection is working.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/", "question": "What are the notable features of this hiking trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a list of hiking trails in the Brno region of the Czech Republic, with varying levels of difficulty and lengths. The trails are verified by experts and reviewed by a global community of adventurers. The AllTrails+ app offers additional features such as offline maps and wrong-turn alerts. The company is committed to protecting the environment and is a Leave No Trace partner.\n\nLinks: ['AllTrails (https://www.alltrails.com/?ref=header)', 'Explore (https://www.alltrails.com/explore?ref=header)', 'Community (https://www.alltrails.com/community?ref=header)', 'Saved (https://www.alltrails.com/members/slug/favorites?ref=header)', 'Shop (https://www.alltrails.com/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
